price: (ចូរចងចាំ)នៅពេលដែលម៉ាឡាអ៊ីកាត់ពីររូបកំពុងកត់ ត្រា(អំពើល្អ និងអំពើអាក្រក់) ដោយអង្គុយនៅខាងស្ដាំ និងនៅ ខាងឆេ្វង។
arabic: إِذۡ يَتَلَقَّى ٱلۡمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٞ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: idh yatalaqqā al-mutalaqiyāni ʿani al-yamīni waʿani al-shimāli qaʿīdun
